attributes.action: NHS dental care should be free to everyone who requires it.
attributes.additional_details: I have always had bad teeth since they started growing. Every night I find myself looking in the mirror and wish i had perfect teeth. I'm obsessed about my oral hygiene yet I have horrible teeth people judge me for my teeth it's the first thing people notice that affects job interviews mental health physical health i cant eat most things so um underweight. No one should be given black fillings because they can't afford to have normal looking people the government has to start putting smiles on everyone's faces and not the few
attributes.background: I want government / parliament to acknowledge and address the unfair treatment of poor individuals and families in this country. People are suffering because they are unable to pay for dental care. Both physically and mentally leading to poor oral hygiene and physical appearance. FREEDENTALNFORALL
